comment._content: William Purnell Jackson (January 11, 1868 – March 7, 1939) the Republican member of the United States Senate, representing the State of Maryland from 1912-1914. His father, William Humphreys Jackson, was a U.S. Congressman from Maryland. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Purnell_Jackson
